Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Syria
   Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's famous work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was brought out in booklet by the Dar Dimask Publishing House of Syria on Oct. 11.
 The work published on Oct. 2, Juche 84 (1995) is an immortal program of party building and activities which reviewed with high pride the glorious history of the WPK which had paved a new path of the building of a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and indicated a way for developing the party as his eternal party.

articles.content:
Greetings to Azerbaijani President
   Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Ilham Aliyev, President of Azerbaijan, Wednesday on the occasion of its 15th national day.
 The message wished the President success in his responsible work, expressing the belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would continue to favorably develop in conformity with the desire and basic interests of the two peoples in the future, too.

Sympathy to Nigerian FM
   Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Paek Nam Sun, minister of Foreign Affairs, sent a message of sympathy to his Nigerian counterpart Joy Ogwu in connection with the recent flood that hit Zampara State, the northern part of the country, claiming big human and material losses. 
 The message extended sympathy to the Nigerian foreign minister, expressing sincere hope that the Nigerian government would eradicate the aftermath of the flood and bring the living of the people in the afflicted areas to normal as early as possible.
